languages.text: "И еще". {n}Абеляр по-военному выпрямляется.{/n} "Я погорячился, Лорд-капитан. И я чувствую, что должен объясниться".
"And..." {n}Abelard stands straight at attention.{/n} "I lost my temper, Lord Captain. And I believe I ought to explain myself."
languages.original_text: "И еще". {n}Абеляр по-военному выпрямляется.{/n} "Я погорячился, Лорд-капитан. И я чувствую, что должен объясниться".

traits.locale_text: "And..." {n}Abelard stands straight at attention.{/n} "I lost my temper, Lord Captain. And I believe I ought to explain myself."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And..." {n}Abelard stands straight at attention.{/n} "I lost my temper, Lord Captain. And I believe I ought to explain myself."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And..." {n}Abelard stands straight at attention.{/n} "I lost my temper, Lord Captain. And I believe I ought to explain myself."

traits.locale_text: "And..." {n}Abelard stands straight at attention.{/n} "I lost my temper, Lord Captain. And I believe I ought to explain myself."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “而且……”{n}阿贝拉德立正站好。{/n}“我发了脾气，舰长大人。我相信我应该好好解释一下才是。”
languages.original_text: "And..." {n}Abelard stands straight at attention.{/n} "I lost my temper, Lord Captain. And I believe I ought to explain myself."

traits.locale_text: “而且……”{n}阿贝拉德立正站好。{/n}“我发了脾气，舰长大人。我相信我应该好好解释一下才是。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Y...». {n}Abelard se cuadra.{/n} «He perdido los estribos, Lord Capitán, y creo que me corresponde explicarme».
languages.original_text: "And..." {n}Abelard stands straight at attention.{/n} "I lost my temper, Lord Captain. And I believe I ought to explain myself."

traits.locale_text: «Y...». {n}Abelard se cuadra.{/n} «He perdido los estribos, Lord Capitán, y creo que me corresponde explicarme».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「そして…」{n}アベラルドは背筋を伸ばす。{/n}「我は怒りに呑まれました、ロード・キャプテン。釈明をせねばならないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "And..." {n}Abelard stands straight at attention.{/n} "I lost my temper, Lord Captain. And I believe I ought to explain myself."

traits.locale_text: 「そして…」{n}アベラルドは背筋を伸ばす。{/n}「我は怒りに呑まれました、ロード・キャプテン。釈明をせねばならないでしょう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Und ..." {n}Abelard nimmt Habachtstellung an.{/n} "Ich habe die Beherrschung verloren, Lord Captain. Und ich glaube, ich sollte mich erklären."
languages.original_text: "And..." {n}Abelard stands straight at attention.{/n} "I lost my temper, Lord Captain. And I believe I ought to explain myself."

traits.locale_text: "Und ..." {n}Abelard nimmt Habachtstellung an.{/n} "Ich habe die Beherrschung verloren, Lord Captain. Und ich glaube, ich sollte mich erklären."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Par ailleurs... {n}poursuit Abélard au garde-à-vous, raide comme un piquet.{/n} J'ai perdu mon sang-froid, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Il me semble que je vous dois des explications. »
languages.original_text: "And..." {n}Abelard stands straight at attention.{/n} "I lost my temper, Lord Captain. And I believe I ought to explain myself."

traits.locale_text: « Par ailleurs... {n}poursuit Abélard au garde-à-vous, raide comme un piquet.{/n} J'ai perdu mon sang-froid, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Il me semble que je vous dois des explications. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Bir de..." {n}Abelard, hazır ol duruşunda bekliyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, haddimi aştım. Size bir açıklama borçluyum."
languages.original_text: "And..." {n}Abelard stands straight at attention.{/n} "I lost my temper, Lord Captain. And I believe I ought to explain myself."

traits.locale_text: "Ve..." {n}Abelard, hazır ol duruşunda bekliyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, haddimi aştım. Size bir açıklama borçluyum."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
